forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West northwest wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 48. North northwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds beneath a brilliant sky, where sunbeams dance playfully across the cityscape. With temperatures hovering around the mid-sixties, the crispness in the air doesn't hinder the gaiety of the day. A gentle west-northwest breeze carries with it the refreshingly muted scent of the ocean, stirring a sense of renewed possibility. Fog, a familiar specter in this coastal environment, holds back today, allowing the majestic Golden Gate Bridge to stand proudly against a backdrop of blue.

As daylight wanes tonight, expect mostly clear skies giving way to a serene evening. With temperatures settling into the cool embrace of the low forties, an extra layer will be wise, perhaps a light jacket or a cozy sweater to ward off the evening chill. The urban landscape beckons with simplicity; a leisurely stroll along the waterfront could invigorate the spirit or perhaps a visit to one of the local cafés, where the aroma of freshly brewed coffee mingles with the chatter of fellow San Franciscans. This day, wrapped in clarity and comfort, invites you to savor the moment—simple pleasures abound amidst the urban charm.
